alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 2:59PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Graham and central Greenlee Counties through 345 PM MST... At 259 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clifton, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Safford, Clifton, Thatcher, Solomon, Morenci, Roper Lake State Park, Safford Regional Airport, Pima, Duncan, Central, York, Franklin, Three Way, Swift Trail Junction, Guthrie and Frye Mesa Dam. This includes the following highways... Route 70 between mile markers 331 and 385. Route 75 between mile markers 379 and 398. Route 78 between mile markers 155 and 174. Route 191 between mile markers 113 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
